review: Incredibly easy to setup and get it running, also comes with a power source if you don't have a spare usb in your tv.Still missing some important apps to make your experience fully enjoyable but undoubtedly a great product.
author: Omar Ajoue

review: Wouldn't talk to my kindle or laptop.  Was able to connect it using my Iphone
author: Christopher Miller

review: Better than expected.  Very easy to setup.  There is no hiccup.  Very satisfied with the device.I have other wireless dongles and they are terrible.  So don't waste your money on them.  Just get yourself a Chromecast,  You won't be disappointed.
author: Steven S. Tang

review: Easy to install on each tv, almost all player can be casted, all you watch in chrome can be watched in the tv.
author: Excelent

review: Works great for Netflix and Pandora from the phones. It hasn't worked well from the laptop.
author: Joshua M. Dahlstrom "Yoshee"

review: Great tool for streaming pictures and video to your TV. I bought one for each TV and use them daily.
author: Charlie
